label: Telegram to J. Palmer Gaillard from Isaiah Bennett
description: Telegram to J. Palmer Gaillard from Isaiah Bennett asking Gaillard to schedule a meeting between administrators, workers, and union representatives.

metadata.label: Transcript
metadata.value:
MIN NL PDB SPECIAL CHARGE)

NATIONAL ORGAINIZING [sic] COMMITTEE
OF HOSPITAL WORKERS
655 EAST BAY ST
CHARLESTON SOCAR

MAYOR J PALMER GAILLARD
CITY HALL
CHARLESTON SOCAR

DEAR MAYOR GAILLARD:

I AM CONTACTING YOU CONCERNING THE ALARMING AND DISTURBING SITUATION
AT THE MEDICAL COLLEGE HOSPITAL IN CHARLESTON. ON BEHALF OF THE WORKERS
AT THIS HOSPITAL, I CAN SAY THAT OUR PROBLEMS ARE NOW BEGINNING 
TO BE GIVEN THE CONSIDERATION THEY DESERVE. I HOPE YOU
WILL JOIN THE STEUGGLE [sic] [struggle] FOR OUR SUPPORT, AND GIVE CONSIDERATION TO
THE CONDITIONS OF POVERTY AND DISCRIMINATION WHICH OUR WORKERS EXPERIENCE.
WE WOULD LIKE YOU TO ARRANGE A MEETING, AS SOON AS POSSIBLE,
THE ADMINISTRATION OF THE HOSPITAL THE COMMITTEE OF THE
WORKERS, AND THEIR ELECTED REPRESENTATIVES.
SINCERELY
ISAIAH BENNETT
ORGANIZER OF HOSPITAL
WORKERS IN S.C.
